website_summaries.verdict: Provides cost-effective nutrients that can volumize the hair shafts of both men and women.
pros: We love that this product is not only cost effective, but delivers essential nutrients to hair needs
Helps hair look and feel bouncy and fresh
Easy to work into hair and style as one pleases
cons: Slightly heavy in terms of absorption

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: I have been plagued all my life with fine, thin hair. when I first discovered this product, I thougt it would be just like all th other thickening serums I had tried. Was I surprised! It is wonderful. My hair has never had so much body and fullness. I can't do without it now.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Givens

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Adds body to my thinning hair with occasional use. The company is in transition and I don't think products will be around much longer. Hairspray is already unavailable.
customer_reviews.author: DanO

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Product for your hair!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best serum to use especially if you have thin hair. Great sellers also!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Velikaneye

customer_reviews.title: Hair looks clean, not greasy
customer_reviews.text: I'm 55 and have medium length, very fine, thinning hair. It is totally scent-free and one pump is all I need to texturize. Not sticky and leaves hair easy to style and looking fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great to add fullness to hair. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have fine, thin
customer_reviews.text: I have fine, thin, and straight hair. This product works very well. I use curlers in my hair with it, it will still look good the next day!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce L. Stoner

customer_reviews.title: Fuller looking head of hair
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it does exactly what it says. I have scarring Alopecia so it does make my hair look thicker and therefore more fuller.
customer_reviews.author: darlene evans

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I don't see it in stores anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Escobar

customer_reviews.title: At last, a hair thickening product that works.
customer_reviews.text: Made my hair look 30 years younger. It gives hair power and control and youthfulness. This works. Women 20 years younger than i am, were coming in to me.
customer_reviews.author: James S. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: hair treatment
customer_reviews.text: gives hair feeling of fullness,as for scent not much in the way of fragrance
customer_reviews.author: pete 01

customer_reviews.title: Great cover and hold.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, holds good and makes the hair look full.
customer_reviews.author: Pipo

customer_reviews.title: Really works especially with short hair.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for years. Love it. Shampoo 2 x’s a week,when I wake up,comb with wet comb, let dry, then comb and am set for the day.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for several years. It works well with my hairtype
customer_reviews.author: Judy Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to its name
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic. I have very thin hair and when applied after a couple days, the texture of my hair has thickened. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Risa Ramcharitar

customer_reviews.title: ... been using this product for several years and Ireally like it cause it does what I want it to
customer_reviews.text: Ihave been using this product for several years and Ireally like it cause it does what I want it to do
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.   Potter

customer_reviews.title: I have to say, I gave this product a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I gave this product a very long trial. 90 days more and six bottles... I wish I had not. At first, the appearance of fuller hair. The price is more rapid hair loss. I'm using Nioxin again. It seems to be coaxing new growth back, that was I am afraid, was lost to this "stuff"
customer_reviews.author: David O. Shantz

customer_reviews.title: come-over guy and this stuff has been consistently great for the 20+ years that I have used it
customer_reviews.text: I am a bald-on-top, come-over guy and this stuff has been consistently great for the 20+ years that I have used it. I bought it in stores when I started using it and as long as I can find it on line I will continue to use it - unless (of course) I can talk my girlfriend into allowing my to go bald on top,
customer_reviews.author: Ted P

customer_reviews.title: A co-worker told me about this product, so I ...
customer_reviews.text: A co-worker told me about this product, so I ordered it and so far it has worked very well. It's not a magic cure by any stretch, but it does make my hair look fuller and the normal part on top isn't as noticeable - at least to me.
customer_reviews.author: 52peg

customer_reviews.title: Best product for fine thin hair!
customer_reviews.text: This is what works for my fine limp hair! It doesn’t make it stiff or dry, it’s just such a good product. I would highly recommend it. Have used it for years, but cannot find it in stores anymore. I sure hope it will not be discontinued!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Jeppesen

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for probably 10 years. It is terrific but has gotten increasingly difficult to find in stores. Delighted that Amazon carries it. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Each bottle should be sealed
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the fact that each bottle was not sealed. Anything could have been poured into those bottles and shipped to me. It smells like shampoo, disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: It's helpful
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell of this product and I like that it helps to bounce my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Alongi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, have been using it for over a year. Thickens my hairs helps to hold wave & does not make it dull.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky L. Giraud

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Great Service
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for volumizing my hair and the seller shipped very promptly - thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Bovenkamp

customer_reviews.title: it works as claimed.
customer_reviews.text: it works as claimed. You can leave it in as a wet look or dry and comb your hair with it in and it looks natural and thicker
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bruce Doherty

product_meta.title: Thicker Fuller Hair Instantly Thick Serum 5oz. Cell-U-Plex (3 Pack)
